remarks: Subtraction property of first (inner product) argument.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmaplns1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmaplns1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplns1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmaplns1.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
hdmaplns1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmaplns1.n $e |- N = ( -g ` R ) $.
hdmaplns1.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmaplns1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmaplns1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmaplns1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmaplns1.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmaplns1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Z ) ` ( X .- Y ) ) = ( ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) N ( ( S ` Z ) ` Y ) ) ) $.
